page.title: 09GAMES DAGENHAM CHILDREN PLAY
page.content: Our favourite playground games are{ {hopscotch, hide and seek}and {off {ground touch. In {hopscotch}there are 1 to 10 drawn on the ground. You have to find a stone and throw it on number one. Then you hop and jump over the numbers, get your stone and throw it on the next number. If you miss or touch the lines with the stone or your feet, the next person goes. In {hide and seek}one person counts up to 100 and the others hide. Then the seeker has to go and find the ones who are hiding. {Off ground touch}is a game where one person has to chase the others and touch them before they get onto the chair. If they touch someone, he becomes the chaser.
